name: PublishExtension
description: Publish a Team Services extension to the Visual Studio Marketplace
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectTo
inputs.label: Connect to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publish to Visual Studio Team Services or a local TFS server.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: VSTS Marketplace connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service endpoint connection to install the extension.

inputs.name: connectedServiceNameTFS
inputs.label: TFS Local Gallery connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service endpoint connection to install the extension.

inputs.name: vsixFile
inputs.label: VSIX file
inputs.helpMarkDown: VSIX file to publish. Supports wildcards.

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Root manifest folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where manifest file(s) exist.

inputs.name: localizationRoot
inputs.label: Localization Root folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where localization file(s) exist.

inputs.name: patternManifest
inputs.label: Manifest file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern for the manifest files to join.

inputs.name: publisherId
inputs.label: Publisher ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension publisher ID. If not specified, the publisher specified in the manifest will be used.

inputs.name: extensionId
inputs.label: Extension ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension ID. If not specified, the extension ID specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionTag
inputs.label: Extension Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension Tag to append to the extension ID

inputs.name: extensionName
inputs.label: Extension name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension name. If not specified, the extension name specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionVersion
inputs.label: Extension version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension version. If not specified, the extension version specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: updateTasksVersion
inputs.label: Override task version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search for contributed tasks in extension manifests and updates the version specified in each Build and Release task found.

inputs.name: updateTasksVersionType
inputs.label: Override Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Task version replacement format. You can select which part(s) of the version number to update (Major, Minor or Patch)

inputs.name: updateTasksId
inputs.label: Override task id
inputs.helpMarkDown: EXPERIMENTAL - Search for contributed tasks in extension manifests and updates the id specified in each Build and Release task found.

inputs.name: extensionVisibility
inputs.label: Extension visibility
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension visibility (Public vs Private) and optionally adds the Preview flag. If not specified, the extension visibility specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: extensionPricing
inputs.label: Extension pricing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Overrides extension pricing (Free vs Paid). If not specified, the extension pricing specified in the manifest will be used

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable name to assign the location of the generated package to.

inputs.name: shareWith
inputs.label: Share with
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of accounts with which to share the extension if it's private (e.g. account_x,account_y,account_z). Share is ignored for public extensions and when publishing to TFS.
inputs.visibleRule: extensionVisibility = private || extensionVisibility = privatepreview || extensionVisibility = default

inputs.name: bypassLocalValidation
inputs.label: Bypass local validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bypass local validation.

inputs.name: noWaitValidation
inputs.label: Don't wait for validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Don't block command for extension validation.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to the package and publishing tool.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory to run the package and publishing process from. Defaults to the folder where the manifest is located.
